Row.Text: Can work Moutains Tiles. Lakes have a adjacency for [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS]Happiness.

[LIST][LI]Can work Moutains Tiles. Lakes have a adjacency for [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS]Happiness.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Shwedagon Zedi Daw[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Swiss Confederacy's associated Wonder.
